Text:
Um... Do What? That Doesn't Make Any Since At All, What Is This?

This Is Not A Service Pack.

This files comes directly from the Coda Music website as an update for registered users that updates. 

Here is the text describing it from the Coda Music website:

"Finale 2011b is a free, downloadable update available to registered Finale 2011 users. It addresses concerns new to Finale 2011a and contains the improvements and new features released with Finale 2011a. It adds expanded functionality to copy expressions to other staves, updated scanning technology â€“ resulting in improved scanning results and expanded support for Canon-brand scanners, and more." 

Um... what doesn't make sense about that?

thanks,.. nice upload,... well done,.. ; )

even better with comments...

"michaelingeorgia"

lol! Well It Does Now, Sorry About That. When I Read The Description, It Just Didn't Sound Right... Sorry About That, Yup Confirmed! It's All Gravy :)

Updating with this file caused Finale 2011 to be a trial program for 30 days.  The patch that came with the full version did not fix that.  Is there a new patch for this?  I downloaded the full version from here: 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6003228/MakeMusic_Finale_2011.r2_HYBRID_ISO-RBS

Thanks for the help.
Hey, thanks for the update, but I am having the same problem as Computer-User with getting past the 30 trial with the patch. How do we get around that?
